#  Macbook 

 Macbook

## 

 OmniDiskSweeper`brew cask install omnidisksweeper`

## Homebrew 

 Homebrew  cleanup  `brew update && brew upgrade && brew cleanup`

Homebrew  git  `git gc`  git  git  (loose object)  `gc` git  packfile 

![ Homebrew ](/img/cleanmac.png)



```
#!/bin/sh

cd "$(brew --repo)" && git gc --prune=now

root="$(brew --repo)/Library/Taps/homebrew/"

echo $root
for d in `ls $root`
do
    echo " clean $root$d ..."
    cd $root$d && git gc --prune=now
done

root="$(brew --repo)/Library/Taps/caskroom/"
echo $root
for d in `ls $root`
do
    echo " clean $root$d ..."
    cd $root$d && git gc --prune=now
done
```

## Xcode 

Xcode 

```
~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData
~/Library/Developer/Xcode/Archives
~/Library/Developer/Xcode/iOS DeviceSupport
~/Library/Developer/Xcode/watchOS DeviceSupport
~/Library/Developer/CoreSimulator 
```

## MongoDB 

 MongoDB journal  1G  MongoDB  3.4  3.6  4.0

```
brew install mongodb@3.4
brew services start mongodb@3.4
/usr/local/opt/mongodb@3.4/bin/mongo
> db.adminCommand( { setFeatureCompatibilityVersion: "3.4" } )
brew uninstall mongodb@3.4

//  MongoDB 3.6
brew services start mongodb@3.6
/usr/local/opt/mongodb@3.6/bin/mongo
> db.adminCommand( { setFeatureCompatibilityVersion: "3.6" } )
brew services stop mongodb@3.6
brew uninstall mongodb@3.6

//  MongoDB 4
brew install mongodb
brew services start mongodb
```

 MMAPV1 wiredTiger MongoDB 

```
mongodump --out mongodb
brew uninstall mongodb
rm -rf /usr/local/var/mongodb
brew install mongodb
brew services start mongodb
mongorestore mongodb
```

git init

heroku create
heroku buildpacks:set heroku/php

heroku config:set APP_URL=xxx

```
<?php
namespace App\Http\Middleware;
use Illuminate\Http\Request;
use Fideloper\Proxy\TrustProxies as Middleware;
class TrustProxies extends Middleware
{
    protected $proxies = '*';
    protected $headers = Request:: HEADER_X_FORWARDED_AWS_ELB;
}
```

`
To have launchd start mongodb at login:
    ln -sfv /usr/local/opt/mongodb/*.plist ~/Library/LaunchAgents
    ln -sfv /usr/local/opt/redis/*.plist ~/Library/LaunchAgents
Then to load mongodb now:
    launchctl load ~/Library/LaunchAgents/homebrew.mxcl.mongodb.plist
    launchctl load ~/Library/LaunchAgents/homebrew.mxcl.redis.plist
Or, if you dont want/need launchctl, you can just run:
    mongod --config /usr/local/etc/mongod.conf
    redis-server /usr/local/etc/redis.conf
`

#!/usr/bin/env python2

from capstone import *

0x2:   mul ecx          \xf7\xe1  //  ecx

0x5:   push 0x68732f2f  \x68\x2f\x2f\x73\x68  // 
0xa:   push 0x6e69622f  \x68\x2f\x62\x69\x6e  // 
0xf:   mov ebx, esp     \x89\xe3  //  ebx
0x11:  mov al, 0xb      \xb0\x0b  //  0xb == 11
0x13:  int 0x80         \xcd\x80  // 0x80 
```

int main()
{

```

# 

## 

 gdb  AT&T  Intel 

```
echo "set disassembly-flavor intel" > ~/.gdbinit
```

## GDB 


* `b[reak] <||>` 

* `r[un]` 

* `c[continue]` 

* `s/n` Step into /Step Over 

* `si/ni`  `s/n` 

* `p [varialbe/register]` /


## Debug 

 `gdb level1`  `disas vulnerable_function`  `layout asm`  `b  vulnerable_function`  `r` `p $eip`  EIP 

```
   0x00001220 <+0>:	    push   ebp
   0x00001221 <+1>:	    mov    ebp,esp
   0x00001223 <+3>:	    push   ebx
   0x00001224 <+4>:	    sub    esp,0x84

   0x0000122a <+10>:	call   0x1218 <__x86.get_pc_thunk.ax>
   0x0000122f <+15>:	add    eax,0x2d99
   0x00001234 <+20>:	sub    esp,0x4          // <----a

   0x00001237 <+23>:	push   0x100             // 256
   0x0000123c <+28>:	lea    edx,[ebp-0x88]    // -+
   0x00001242 <+34>:	push   edx               // -+--  ebp-0x88buf
   0x00001243 <+35>:	push   0x0               // STDIN_FILENO
   0x00001245 <+37>:	mov    ebx,eax
   0x00001247 <+39>:	call   0x1040 <read@plt> // read

   0x0000124c <+44>:	add    esp,0x10
   0x0000124f <+47>:	nop
   0x00001250 <+48>:	mov    ebx,DWORD PTR [ebp-0x4]
   0x00001253 <+51>:	leave                    // mov esp,ebp; pop ebp;
   0x00001254 <+52>:	ret                      // pop eip; jump eip;

   -----------------------

   0x0000126f <+26>:	call   0x1220 <vulnerable_function> // push eip; jump XX;

```
